Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) provide a clean and efficient pathway to use a variety of carbon containing fuels for power generation.
Titulo: Comparison of off-gas utilization modes for solid oxide fuel cell stacks based on a semi-empirical parametric model

Sentencas: Reuse or recycle of the high-temperature off-gas can help to improve the fuel or air utilization of SOFC stacks, as well as to improve system efficiency and reduce operating costs.
Titulo: Comparison of off-gas utilization modes for solid oxide fuel cell stacks based on a semi-empirical parametric model

Sentencas: The off-gas utilization mode and its effect on the stack performance need to be further clarified.
Titulo: Comparison of off-gas utilization modes for solid oxide fuel cell stacks based on a semi-empirical parametric model

Sentencas: In this study, a novel semi-empirical parametric stack model was established based on the experimental data of a 3-cell SOFC stack.
Titulo: Comparison of off-gas utilization modes for solid oxide fuel cell stacks based on a semi-empirical parametric model

Sentencas: This parametric model can accurately predict the output performance of real stacks, which was verified by multi-condition experiments.
Titulo: Comparison of off-gas utilization modes for solid oxide fuel cell stacks based on a semi-empirical parametric model

Sentencas: Based on this stack model, one basic process and four off-gas utilization modes were designed and constructed.
Titulo: Comparison of off-gas utilization modes for solid oxide fuel cell stacks based on a semi-empirical parametric model

Sentencas: Comparative analysis of these modes under different operation parameters was carried out.
Titulo: Comparison of off-gas utilization modes for solid oxide fuel cell stacks based on a semi-empirical parametric model

Sentencas: The effects of key operation parameters, including fuel flow rate, operating current, stack temperature, pre-reformer temperature, split ratio and recycle ratio on the stack performance were studied, which were characterized by the electrical efficiency and exergy efficiency of the power module.
Titulo: Comparison of off-gas utilization modes for solid oxide fuel cell stacks based on a semi-empirical parametric model

Sentencas: It was found that the mode with two-stage stacks can get the maximum electrical efficiency (> 45%) with the operating current less than 20 A, while the mode with anode off-gas recycled to the pre-reformer instead obtained the maximum electrical efficiency (> 35%) when the specified current was larger than 25 A. A comprehensive and in-depth perspective on different stack off-gas utilization modes is provided, which can supply feasible guidance for the next-step overall system design.
Titulo: Comparison of off-gas utilization modes for solid oxide fuel cell stacks based on a semi-empirical parametric model

Sentencas: Besides, the stack modeling and process simulation method developed in this study can provide reference for related research.
Titulo: Comparison of off-gas utilization modes for solid oxide fuel cell stacks based on a semi-empirical parametric model
